snippet: Gov. Pete Wilson added his voice to the chorus of attacks on Hollywood on Tuesday night, saying it was wrong to sell "trash to children."    Mr. Wilson, who is expected to announce his bid for the Republican Presidential nomination soon, did not m...
lead_paragraph: Gov. Pete Wilson added his voice to the chorus of attacks on Hollywood on Tuesday night, saying it was wrong to sell "trash to children." Mr. Wilson, who is expected to announce his bid for the Republican Presidential nomination soon, did not mention that he had received substantial contributions from the entertainment industry in his re-election campaign last year.

headline.main: Gov. Wilson Joins Attack On Movies
